title: WaMu sans serif
content:
Sorry if this has been covered...Washington Mutual bank is now using a stylish sans serif in their pubs...what is it? A recent release, I believe.

comments.content: Thanks Justin...that's it...unfortunately it's absurdly expensive for a freelancer. Pity.
